item.description:
I hope one of your new year's resolutions was to Improv Incubate more often. Here's your first chance.

We'll pull the funny in from the cold and make it all warm and fuzzy with our laughter! This week one of our regulars Giovanni will be organizing along with two of our veteran organizers, Doug and Seth.

Bring yourself and smile!


And a big hello and come on down welcome to everyone who's been joining the incubator lately. Remember, no previous improv experience required whatsoever. We all have a little bit of laughter to give and receive.

I look forward to meeting you all soon!

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.name: Theres somethin strange in ur HarvardSquare, who ya gonna call? ImprovIncubators
